text: The Tamil Nadu Dr. J. Jayalalithaa Music and Fine Arts University (TNJMFAU) was established by the Tamil Nadu Government to promote Music and Arts in Tamil Nadu. It is located in Chennai, Tamil Nadu. It was established in 2013. On 24 September 2019, It has been renamed by Government of Tamil Nadu as The Tamil Nadu Dr. J. Jayalalithaa Music and Fine Arts University to honor the former Chief Minister of Tamil Nadu J. Jayalalithaa, founder and first chancellor of the university. ==References== ==External links== * Category:Music schools in India Category:Art schools in India Category:Dance schools in India Category:Universities in Chennai
title: Tamil Nadu Music and Fine Arts University
